name: Bananas Faster
description:
Oh no! 

You've been making a killing at the high limit craps table in Monty's Monkey Casino and the pit boss thinks he saw you swap out for some weighted dice, and he's not holding any punches to get back the money he thinks you stole. Escape the casino in this speed-based action platformer and compete with your friends for the best clear time!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows - move/crouch
  • O - Jump
  • I - Shoot

Credits:

  • Design, Art, Music - Joe Gibson
  • Programming, Additional Art - Kyle Thompson

Made in a little over 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam
